Topic.Title: Does someone have contact info to customer care for Yahoo!

Message.Msg: That's trick question I'm afraid as the help and customer care is a run around. That being said if choose the right subject and sub-title to complain about you can get through to a real person...granted this person will get back to you within 3-5 days, it is a real person. The "urgent" reply of less than 3 days is if you use the harassment subject I think. When I lost my ID last time, in which I got a run around for a week...half said I was fine and it still got deleted they gave me a way. Sorry I can't remember it though. Oh, you can go to their FB page as I laid into them there and they begged to write them privately.lmao Have them fix these typing boxes too as it only shows 2 and half lines of typing. Thanks!
